templates.content: Yes! Simply call the store, we will give you a total for your local delivery or in-store pickup order, and you can choose the "custom order" product (located on the main menu) and insert the amount there, and then proceed with checkout as normal.

templates.content: Please note that we offer local delivery and in-store pick-up in Las Vegas only. You'll be able to choose your preferred method in your cart. If you decide to go for delivery, you can choose the delivery date at checkout.

templates.content: On December 31st our stores are open from 9 am - 11 pm and on January 1st from 10 am - 6 pm.
